room_title: Escape room "Immunity Quest" by Locked in Fun in Chicago
review: What a great time with my family!!! I'll recommend this place to all my friends

room_title: Escape room "Immunity Quest" by Locked in Fun in Chicago
review: This was our first time at an escape room. We really enjoyed ourselves. We will be coming back to try the other room.

room_title: Escape room "Immunity Quest" by Locked in Fun in Chicago
review: I came here with a group of 6, and we had a blast! It was challenging and fun. There are two rooms, and we did the 'easier' Immunity room (45 minutes) - it was still quite tough! Great fun for family, friend, and work outings. There is nothing scary so it's great for people with kids or for scaredy-cats :) we finished with exactly 4 seconds to spare, with a little help from the game monitor. Wonderful experience, and I'd highly recommend it.
